high_descs: Make a left to walk past the couch to the white dresser.
Pick up the credit card from the dresser.
Turn right to walk to the checkered couch.
Set the credit card down on the checkered couch.
anns.task_desc: Move a credit card to the checkered couch.

high_descs: walk to face small table with plant
pick up credit card from table
turn left and go left again at the couch and then straight to the end table
pick up the credit card sitting on the end table
turn around and go straight to the couch
set the credit card down on the couch
anns.task_desc: Move the credit card to the couch
